4 Formatting:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='AvoidDoubleBraceInitialization'>
        <property name='allowByTailComment' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEscapesForControlCharacters' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowNonPrintableEscapes' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='AvoidNestedBlocks'>
        <property name='allowInSwitchCase' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='WhitespaceAround'>
        <property name='allowEmptyCatches' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyConstructors' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyLambdas' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyLoops' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyMethods' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowEmptyTypes' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='NeedBraces'>
        <property name='allowEmptyLoopBody' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowSingleLineStatement' value='true'/>
    </module>
    <module name='EmptyBlock'>
        <property name='option' value='value'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='value'/>
    </module>
    <module name='Indentation'>
        <property name='arrayInitIndent' value='value'/>
        <property name='basicOffset' value='value'/>
        <property name='braceAdjustment' value='value'/>
        <property name='caseIndent' value='value'/>
        <property name='forceStrictCondition' value='value'/>
        <property name='lineWrappingIndentation' value='value'/>
        <property name='throwsIndent' value='value'/>
    </module>
    <module name='EmptyCatchBlock'>
        <property name='commentFormat' value='value'/>
        <property name='exceptionVariableName' value='value'/>
    </module>
    <module name='OneTopLevelClass'>
        <property name='id' value='value'/>
    </module>"
}

{

4.1.3 Empty blocks: may be concise:
{
    "Answer":  "Yes",
    "Configuration":
    "<module name='EmptyBlock'>
        <property name='option' value='TEXT'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_DEFAULT'/>
    </module>
    <module name='EmptyCatchBlock'>
        <property name='commentFormat' value='.*'/>
        <property name='exceptionVariableName' value='.*'/>
    </module>
    <module name='NeedBraces'>
        <property name='allowEmptyLoopBody' value='true'/>
        <property name='allowSingleLineStatement' value='true'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED'/>
    </module>
    <module name='RightCurly'>
        <property name='option' value='nl'/>
        <property name='tokens' value='CLASS_DEF, METHOD_DEF, CTOR_DEF, STATIC_INIT, INSTANCE_INIT, ENUM_DEF, ANNOTATION_DEF, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_WHILE, LITERAL_FOR'/>
    </module>"
}
